content: This is a true national disgrace. Our obsession with the private market as a solution for everything is so misplaced, nowhere moreso than in for-profit education (except perhaps in private prisons and in healthcare).We tell people that the way to get ahead is with an education, while expecting those least suited to critically examine their options to do just that. This is the inevitable result. In our system of rapacious capitalism, is the moral that so long as  institutions get paid, it's too bad if it destroys people's lives? That they should have read the small print?I am so ashamed for our country.
